metadata.title: CVE-2018-10380 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
kwallet-pam in KDE KWallet before 5.12.6 allows local users to obtainownership of arbitrary files via a symlink attack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10380` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpam-kwallet-common - 4:5.12.5-0ubuntu1
libpam-kwallet4 - 4:5.12.5-0ubuntu1
libpam-kwallet5 - 4:5.12.5-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: kwallet-pam package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:5.12.5-0ubuntu1').
